content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-46.5, -123.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at position (-46.5, -123.5)
- PipeGroup with fluid system 64143, starting at position (-46.5, -122.5)
- Steam Engine at position (-40.5, -113.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -76.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -73.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (9.0, -64.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (6.0, -62.0) with an Inserter at position (6.5, -60.5) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (6.5, -59.5)

### Miscellaneous Structures
- Wooden Chest at position (7.5, -61.5)
- Lab with input of automation science pack at position (not specified)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Entities
- Ensure you can place an entity at a target location before attempting placement. The agent encountered issues placing a boiler at positions (-42.5, -124.0) and (-42.5, -121.5) due to existing objects obstructing the placement.

### Errors with Electricity Connection
- Make sure that all electrical entities are properly connected to the power network. The steam engine at position (-40.5, -113.5) is not connected to the power network and has no input liquid, preventing it from functioning.

### Errors with Resource Management
- Regularly check and manage the inventory of chests and furnaces to ensure they have necessary resources. The burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -76.0) is out of fuel, and the chest at position (-15.5, -77.5) is full, halting further mining. Additionally, stone furnaces have no ingredients to smelt, indicating a need for better resource flow management.
